TriggerOraclev10g.name: TRG_DATEGEN_INS_AFTER_ROW
TriggerOraclev10g.body: DECLARE<br/> v_are_voie BOOLEAN := FALSE ; <br/>BEGIN <br/> FOR i IN 1..pac_variabile_globale.vg_roluri.COUNT LOOP<br/> IF pac_variabile_globale.vg_roluri (i) IN ('INSCRIERE','DBA') THEN<br/> v_are_voie := TRUE ;<br/> END IF ; <br/> END LOOP ; <br/> IF v_are_voie = FALSE THEN<br/> RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR (-20145,'Nu aveti drepturi sa inserati in DATEGEN') ; <br/> END IF ;<br/><br/> SELECT seq_idmodif.NextVal INTO pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif FROM dual ;<br/> pac_variabile_globale.p_init_vg_atribute ('DATEGEN') ;<br/> <br/> INSERT INTO admitere.modificari (idmodif, dataoram, operator, statiem, obs, cnp, tip_modif, tabela)<br/> VALUES (pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif, SYSDATE, admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_operator,<br/> admitere.pac_variabile_globale.vg_statie, 'ins-DATEGEN, old_cnp:'|| :OLD.cnp, :NEW.cnp, 'I', 'DATEGEN') ;<br/><br/><br/> INSERT INTO admitere.ins_dategen ( <br/> CNP, NUME, SEX, STARECIV, NUMEINCAS, CAZARE, MEDICCMP, ROM, BASARABEAN, PASSWORD, <br/> DATANAST, LOCNAST, JUDNAST, TARANAST, BISERIE, BINR, BIELIBLA, BIELIBDE, TATA, MAMA, SAT, <br/> STRADA, NR, BLOC, ETAJ, APART, TEL, MOBIL, EMAIL, TARA, CODLICEU, ANABSOLV, MEDGENBAC, <br/> MEDLICAN5, MEDGENLIC, IDLOCNAST, IDLOCBI, CNPGRESIT, PRENUME, INITIALA_TATALUI, <br/> STAGIU_MILITAR, STUD_FACULT, STUD_AN, STUD_TAXA, STUD_NRSEM, STUD_STATPART,<br/> BUGET_STAT, BUGET_NRSEM, BURSA_STUD, BURSA_NRSEM, CODPOSTAL, CODFACULT, <br/> SPECIALIZARE_FACULT, ANABSOLV_FACULT, CETATENIE, NATIONALITATE, SCARA, MEDANISTUD, <br/> MEDLICENTA, CERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, TIPCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, <br/> TESTENGLEZA, PUNCTAJCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGV, OPTIUNEPTSTEC, ETNIE, <br/> STARESOCSPEC, PROFILLICEU, DURATALICEU, FORMAINVLICEU, NRACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, <br/> SERIEACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, ADMITERIMULTIPLE, DIZABILITATI, PROFILFACULTATE, <br/> TITLUFACULTATE, FORMAINVFACULT, FORMAFINANTAREFACULT, DURATAFACULTATE, <br/> TIPDIPLOMAFACULT, DIPLSERIEFACULT, DIPLNRFACULT, DIPLEMISDEFACULT, DIPLANEMITEREFACULT, <br/> FOAIEMATRFACULT, DIPLRECUNOASTERENRFACULT, DIPLRECUNOASTERESERIEFACULT, <br/> OLIMPIC, BIVALABILPANALA, ANABSOLVFACULTATE, MSDIPLOMAFACULTLAFEAA, idmodif ) <br/> VALUES ( <br/>:new.CNP, :new.NUME, :new.SEX, :new.STARECIV, :new.NUMEINCAS, :new.CAZARE, :new.MEDICCMP, :new.ROM, :new.BASARABEAN, :new.PASSWORD, <br/>:new.DATANAST, :new.LOCNAST, :new.JUDNAST, :new.TARANAST, :new.BISERIE, :new.BINR, :new.BIELIBLA, :new.BIELIBDE, :new.TATA, :new.MAMA, :new.SAT,<br/> :new.STRADA, :new.NR, :new.BLOC, :new.ETAJ, :new.APART, :new.TEL, :new.MOBIL, :new.EMAIL, :new.TARA, :new.CODLICEU, :new.ANABSOLV, :new.MEDGENBAC,<br/> :new.MEDLICAN5, :new.MEDGENLIC, :new.IDLOCNAST, :new.IDLOCBI, :new.CNPGRESIT, :new.PRENUME, :new.INITIALA_TATALUI, <br/> :new.STAGIU_MILITAR, :new.STUD_FACULT, :new.STUD_AN, :new.STUD_TAXA, :new.STUD_NRSEM, :new.STUD_STATPART, <br/> :new.BUGET_STAT, :new.BUGET_NRSEM, :new.BURSA_STUD, :new.BURSA_NRSEM, :new.CODPOSTAL, :new.CODFACULT, <br/>:new.SPECIALIZARE_FACULT, :new.ANABSOLV_FACULT, :new.CETATENIE, :new.NATIONALITATE, :new.SCARA, :new.MEDANISTUD, <br/>:new.MEDLICENTA, :new.CERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, :new.TIPCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGVISTICA, <br/>:new.TESTENGLEZA, :new.PUNCTAJCERTIFCOMPETENTALINGV, :new.OPTIUNEPTSTEC, :new.ETNIE, <br/>:new.STARESOCSPEC, :new.PROFILLICEU, :new.DURATALICEU, :new.FORMAINVLICEU, :new.NRACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, <br/>:new.SERIEACTSTUDIISTRAINATATE, :new.ADMITERIMULTIPLE, :new.DIZABILITATI, :new.PROFILFACULTATE, <br/>:new.TITLUFACULTATE, :new.FORMAINVFACULT, :new.FORMAFINANTAREFACULT, :new.DURATAFACULTATE, <br/> :new.TIPDIPLOMAFACULT, :new.DIPLSERIEFACULT, :new.DIPLNRFACULT, :new.DIPLEMISDEFACULT, :new.DIPLANEMITEREFACULT,<br/> :new.FOAIEMATRFACULT, :new.DIPLRECUNOASTERENRFACULT, :new.DIPLRECUNOASTERESERIEFACULT, <br/> :new.OLIMPIC, :new.BIVALABILPANALA, :new.ANABSOLVFACULTATE, :new.MSDIPLOMAFACULTLAFEAA, pac_variabile_globale.v_seq_idmodif<br/> ) ;<br/>END ;
